msbt.message: Hey, any other rooms to show me? I'd love to see everything.
What? Did I hit a dead end? Ya got a real maze thing goin' on here, .
You've got a lot of stuff lying around.Trying to sharpen your reflexes or something, ?That's so YOU! Your home's like an obstacle course!

<20_2 arg="10" />When it's facing that way, <20_2 arg="9" />you DO know there's no way to use , right?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh! Maybe you put it like that for a reason, ?I don't get it, but if that's how you like it, then that's how it goes!
Hmm I'm getting a lack of that lived-in feeling, due to an absence ofstuff.I wish I could do the simple-living thing too! I'm way too used to comfort now, .
It figures! You've got everything you need. But if I had to add somethingYeah! I think I'd put some workout gear in here, .
Nothing on your walls? I guess that's pretty smart. You could knock stuff down when you're working out.
Whoa! This place is full of rare stuff!Yeah, I'm not the least bit jealous or anything, I swear, !
You've got a lot of expensive-looking stuff in your place, .I'm worried that I'll get so excited, I'll accidentally break something!Ha! Just kidding!
The sparse furnishing of this place is so hip and cool! I'm seeing you in a new light, !
Having all your stuff in here makes this place feel like a secret fort. I'm loving it!I gotta try out this kind of look for my place, !
So this is what you'd call -style Cool, !
This is a really different way to arrange things Interesting, !
I get the sense that you're pretty proud of this place. Maybe I should try doing some of this stuff too!
